day.text: Clouds thickening during day. Rain showers spreading from islands to northeast. In eastern part possible dry. Southerly winds 4-10 m/s, in evening decreasing. Air temperature 18..24, on western coast 10..16°C.
day.peipsi: Southerly winds 4-9 m/s. Wave height 0.4-0.9 m. Dry. Visibility good. Air temperature 18..20°C.

night.text: Clear and slightly cloudy. Dry. In the morning on islands it is clouding up and rain showers locally. At first in continent weak variable wind, after midnight southeast, south wind 2-7, on islands 4-10 m/s. Air temperature 4..10, on western coast up to 12°C.
night.sea:
May 24, 2022 11:00 UTC  

Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 13:00 UTC May 24 to 13:00 UTC May 25, 2022.

Weather summary: High is collapsing and eastern part of Low approaching from Scandinavia. 

No warnings.

Northern Baltic: mainly southeast 3-9, in western waters in gusts up to 12 m/s, at night 5-10, in gusts up to 13 m/s, in the morning and by day southerly winds 4-10 m/s. Today dry, tomorrow rain showers. Visibility good to moderate. 

Gulf of Finland: variable 1-7 m/s, after midnight southeast, south 2-7, in western waters 4-10 m/s, tomorrow by day southerly winds 4-10 m/s. Tomorrow afternoon in western gulf rain showers possible. Visibility mostly good.

Moonsund, Northern Gulf of Riga: southeast, south, tomorrow by day southerly winds 4-10 m/s. Today dry, tomorrow morning and by day rain showers. Visibility good to moderate.
night.peipsi: Before midnight weak variable wind, after midnight southeast, south wind 2-7 m/s. Wave height 0.2-0.7 m. Dry. Visibility good. Air temperature 6..9°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Rain showers in many places. Wind turning gradually to westerly 4-10, in gusts 13 m/s. Air temperature 11..17°C.

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Rain spreading over mainland. Variable wind 2-7, on northeastern coast increasing east, southeast, on islands westerly wind 5-10 m/s. Air temperature 8..14°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Rain showers in many places. In the evening probability for precipitation is decreasing. Southwest, west wind 5-10, in gusts 15 m/s. Air temperature 9..14°C.

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Rain showers in many places. Mainly around west wind 5-10, in gusts 14 m/s. Air temperature 6..10°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Rain in many places. In the evening probability for precipitation is decreasing. Variable wind 2-7 m/s. Air temperature 9..14°C.

night.text: Partly cloudy. Some rain locally. Mainly around west wind 2-8 m/s. Air temperature 4..9°C.
